plot: After thirteen highly unsuccessful years in Los Angeles, two "artistic" best friends get to direct their first ever feature film: a soft-core epic entitled The Lone Rancher, designed for late night TV.
title: Adult Film: A Hollywood Tale
plot_es: After thirteen highly unsuccessful years in Los Angeles, two "artistic" best friends get to direct their first ever feature film: a soft-core epic entitled The Lone Rancher, designed for late night TV.
